titleStmt.title: An answer to a printed book, intituled, Observations upon some of His Maiesties late answers and expresses
titleStmt.author: Diggs, Dudley, 1613-1643.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Dudley Diggs. Cf. BM.
The book being answered is an anonymous treatise, sometimes ascribed to Milton, but really by Henry Parker.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
